DOC.brief_summary: Music consistently show reduce stress increase weight gain premature infant . The mechanism presume improved metabolic efficiency unknown . We aim test hypothesis music Mozart reduce energy expenditure grow healthy preterm infant .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Music Mozart Energy Expenditure Growing Preterm Infants
